headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Fox Is Shifting After Strong Earnings and Rising Analyst Targets
summary: Analysts have nudged up their price expectations for Fox, keeping fair value steady at about $71.53 per share while trimming the discount rate from roughly 6.99% to 6.97%. With long term revenue growth assumptions essentially unchanged at around 1.14%, the higher targets largely reflect greater confidence in Fox's earnings resilience after a strong Q1 and improving trends in advertising, distribution, and subscriber losses. Read on to see how you can track these evolving assumptions and stay...

headline: Are Consumer Discretionary Stocks Lagging  Fox (FOXA) This Year?
